question: Write a letter to a friend who you have met on an overseas trip in an English speaking country. Ask for him to send you the trips photographs.
text: I hope you are good. I am Mohammad whom you have met on a trip to Scotland last month. In fact, it was one of the best trips which I have ever gone. Indeed, Scotland is an extremely beautiful country, ,moreover I have found some close friends, such as you. I am writing to request you to send the photographs of our trip.

Also, I do not have any partners on this trip, but you took some eye-catching photos of me, especially those ones that were taken on the island. In addition, we have some pictures of each other. Please send them to me. Furthermore, your friend took some group photos, please send them if you receive them.
You can send photographs via email or other social networking applications, for example, Wattsapp and Telegram, besides you can create a group in these applications and send all the photos in it.
I am longing to see you again.
